main event: A civilian observer noted a UFO as a pinpoint of light moving steadily in Huntington, West Virginia on January 19, 1964.
interesting points: The observer saw the UFO moving at a constant speed and disappearing suddenly as if the light was turned off.,The UFO was described as a point of light, resembling a star, and pulsed like a twinkling star.,The sighting lasted for about 2.5 minutes.,The course of the object was described as northeast.,Weather conditions were clear and cool with many stars visible.
witness description: civilian observer looking through a window
